scripts.dist: webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildMain && webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildExtraScripts && webpack --joplin-plugin-config createArchive
scripts.dist-legacy-ssl: bash -c "export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildMain && webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildExtraScripts && webpack --joplin-plugin-config createArchive"
scripts.build: webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildMain && webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildExtraScripts && webpack --joplin-plugin-config createArchive
scripts.dev: npm run dist && bash -c "/c/Program\ Files/Joplin/Joplin.exe --env dev"
scripts.dev-legacy-ssl: npm run dist-legacy-ssl && bash -c "/c/Program\ Files/Joplin/Joplin.exe --env dev"
